text:
〉2024年1-8月福建省の是我国 离子电池出 产品的最大来源地。 出口金額为103.08亿美元，同比孩少8.6％，占我国 离子电池出口額的26.9%：出口数量为
174亿个，同比增长10.3%。 广东省位居第二，出口金银为90.57亿美元，同比減少12％，占致国 离子电池出口額的23.6%；出口数量8.79亿个，同比罐长
trans:
〉Fujian Province is the largest source of China's ionic battery exports from January to August 2024. Exports amounted to 10.308 billion dollars, a year-on-year decrease of 8.6%, accounting for 26.9% of China's ionic battery export amount: exports amounted to
17.4 billion units, a year-on-year increase of 10.3%. Guangdong Province ranked second, with an export amount of 9.057 billion dollars, a year-on-year decrease of 12%, accounting for 23.6% of China's ionic battery export amount; exports amounted to 879 million units, a year-on-year increase
